explanation: Funds are required for the Theater Nuclear Weapons Storage and Security System Alarm Control and Display installation. Funds are available because funding was appropriated as part of the Fiscal Year 2021 Vehicular Equipment in Other Procurement, Air Force. The reprogramming action realigns funds to the correct weapon system code within the appropriation and does not change the purpose or intent of the funds. This is base budget funding.
